alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 17 at 2:57PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of west central Florida, including the following county, Hillsborough. * WHEN...Until 600 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 257 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tampa, Temple Terrace, Brandon, East Lake-Orient Park, Palm River-Clair Mel, Mango, Tampa Executive Airport, Seffner, Florida State Fairgrounds, Orient Park, Thonotosassa, Valrico, Dover and Palm River. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
